name: Resurgence: The Eve of Despair
description:
Resurgence: the Eve of Despair is a hybrid of fast paced free-running platforming and hack and slash action. From a cyber city based on Victorian England to a hellish otherworldly realm, run through three challenging stages as quickly as you can, jumping and dashing over perilous pits while fighting through enemies.

The goal is to rush through each level as quickly as you can while building up points. Each level has several ways to reach the goal, incentivizing the need to explore and discover the fastest way to the end.  The faster you go, the better your score. Try your best to beat each level with absolute perfection.
